overview:
At Jama, John represents the voice of our customers and leads our marketing strategy, generating awareness and demand for our products. Prior to Jama, John was Director of Marketing at Omniture and brings 14 years of experience developing brands and managing interactive marketing programs for technology companies including Microsoft, WebTrends and ZAAZ. He has contributed to several books, whitepapers and presentations on web marketing and technology.

John is an avid runner and fundraiser for cancer research supporting both Komen for the Cure and the Lance Armstrong Foundation through his grassroots campaign 5K35. John is a graduate of Oregon State University where he was a 4-year Presidential Scholar. He lives with his wife and three kids in Portland.
